description: Take a look at our collection of sturdy, weather resistant picnic benches, available in a range of sizes and shapes.  Great for beer gardens and restaurants with outdoor seating, our commercial grade picnic tables are practical seating options for many applications.  Our picnic tables and benches come with a guarantee. We also supply a range of commercial parasols and umbrellas to use with our picnic furniture.
name: Picnic Furniture
